name: Better Country
description:
Better Country:

Political simulation game of be the president of a country. Your goal is to take good actions for the country and make the people happy. When you complete your mandate, elections will be held in which having won the support of the people during your mandate is extremely important to win the game. 

Improve different features of the country. 

Get money. 

Talk to the opposition.  

Build support.  

Commit political crimes.

And more...

Release version 1.0-ALPHA:

- Tutorial mode for new players.

- Arnova mode.

- Configuration panel.

- Favorite modes panel.

Especial information:

- Game avaible for all screen sizes.

- Game versión: ALPHA.

- Avaible for PC and ANDROID.

- Only avaible in Spanish.
